title: If 9 painters can paint 3 houses in a week, how many days can 6 painters do the same job? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here use a simple formula:- (a1*b1)/c1 = (a2*b2)/c2 a = no. of workers b= no. of days taken c= no. of work Here we have 9 painters painting 3 houses in 7 days, we have to find days required by 6 painters to paint 3 houses, let x be the no of days required, the equation becomes : (9*7)/3 = (6*x)/3 18*x = 189 Therefore x = 10.5 days ~ 1.5 weeks.
